description: We’ve seen the Arcanists and their nemesis, the Guild; we’ve visited the high society of the Explorers and the depths of the Bayou.  Time to venture into the wilds and see what Ashes of Malifaux has brought the Neverborn. Crookskins Mimics love humans!  They’re so complex, so many great features to imitate… well, most mimics, […]
title: Goonhammer’s Ashes of Malifaux Review Part 5: The Neverborn

description: A Song of Ice and Fire: The Miniatures Game Season 4 has been out for a while now, and people have flooded to the game to try out the new changes. After letting things settle and the initial reactions digest, we continue our review of S.04 and how much it will impact the game for […]
title: Bolton and Neutrals – S04 Review x Welsh GT – ASOIAF: TMG

description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- April 9th, 2024

description: In our How to Paint Everything series we look at how to paint well, everything, with different techniques and approaches. This wee we’re looking at how to take on an airbrush-based approach to OSL painting for a large number of models in Conquest. In this tutorial we’ll be covering all the steps necessary to speedpaint […]
title: How To Paint Everything: Conquest Spires

description: G’day Goonhammer readers! The Trident Realms of Neritica, a vast subnautical empire of numerous aquatic races (and monsters), are the next to be receiving mid-year updates in Kings of War. Similar to the mid-year updates of the Nightstalkers and Northern Alliance in 2023, the Trident Realms’ army list has been revised to accompany a helping […]
title: It’s High Tide For The Trident Realms: New Rules, New Models

description: Hey, you came back! That’s great! Maybe you didn’t, and the SEO gods are just really workin’ for this little article today, or you just like clicking links. Either way, welcome back to the third entry in a series of articles we’re calling “TTRPG Essentials,” each of which focuses on welcoming you into the robust […]
title: Turn Order’s Your First System

description: The secret's out! Dark Angels are live on Administratum - or are they? Read all about it in this bite-sized update!
title: Administratum: The Dark Angels Update

description: This two-part post asks a simple question: what’s it like to drive hundreds of miles to a house in Devon and run a narrative wargaming weekend for five friendly strangers? Welcome to part two, in which I find out. In part one I created a stripped-down version of Warhammer 40,000’s Crusade suitable for weekend events, […]
title: Running a Weekend 40K Campaign for Strangers, Part 2 of 2

description: Welcome back to our Best Year in Gaming March Madness bracket competition! Yesterday we kicked off round two with our first doubleheader and today we have another one. In a lopsided blowout, 2004 beat 1985, and in a competition that wasn’t as close as I expected it to be, 1999 beat 2003 pretty handily. Results: 2004 and […]
title: The Best Year in Gaming – Round 2 in the Northeast Conference

description: We take a look at 2009 and why it was the best year in gaming history.
title: The Best Year in Gaming: 2009
